content: **note from flyinghooks ** designer crochets very tightly - check gauge - use smaller hook pattern needs about two 1 75 ounce 50 gram skeins of sock yarn or fingering weight yarn top down crochet socks with mock ribbed cuff and afterthought heel **from crochetme website ** what s up with so many sock patterns calling for too-thick worsted weight yarn designer pam says i ve seen a lot of crocheters looking for a pattern for crochet socks using sock yarn so they can wear them in their shoes like the knitters do that s what pushed me to make this pattern i wanted to crochet my socks out of sock yarn and wear them in my shoes right on pam
